ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 268
ygData.msgSnippet: Great, thank you for the advice, i am working on making my CHA jewlery now ... Thanks again. ... From: Andrew Collins  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Great, thank you for the advice, i am working on making my CHA jewlery now
:) wont be hard 200 skill hehe.
Thanks again.

----- Original Message -----
From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2000 9:26 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 268


> I wouldn't recommend doing Hateplane with less than 200 CHA, and usually I
> do Fearplane with 200, but it is not quite as important there as
everything
> resists a lot less.
>
> Hate has some nasty trains, I remember getting a Spite and 4 clerics of
> Innoruuk on a pull. We were able to ice the 4 clerics until the spite went
> down, then picked the clerics off one by one, and those things are very
> difficult to get mes to stick. Weve also pulled a train of 8 mobs in Hate
> that we successfully defeated, 200 Charisma is the best gun you can have
up
> there.
> I know many guilds on our server that would have called evac but we're
> usually up for a good challenge.
>
> Items can usually get your int/cha pretty high. I am working now with
> 204cha/176int, but with a few items Ill be able to get over 200/200.
> (adorning grace adds +40 to cha)
>
> >Being Level 50, i need to ask you a question...I am level 41, and have
been
> >working on getting my INT up, not my CHA.
> >my int is 189, and my cha is 135 with buff.
>
> >I hear for the Planes you really need a high CHA, can you comment on this
> >Maelael?
>
> Thanx
>
> -Aeramus, 41 Enchanter, Bristlebane
>
>
